channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Flog It!
channel.desc: The show comes from the 19th-century Highcliffe Castle in Dorset. Christina Trevanion is joined by Philip Serrell, and they have got plenty to be looking at. Christina has fallen in love with a 1960s coat by Biba, and Philip with a classic mouseman cheeseboard. Paul Martin delves into Dorset's Bronze Age past at the Ancient Technology Centre at Cranbourne.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Richard Osman's House of Games
channel.desc: Every day this week, celebrity contestants Rob Deering, Katya Jones, Jayne Middlemiss and Phil Tufnell take on a series of quiz rounds selected by the host, quiz legend Richard Osman.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Rick Stein's Food Stories
channel.desc: Rick Stein begins his food tour of the UK in the Lake District, enjoying a traditional mutton hotpot with sheep farmer and author James Rebanks. Plus, he pays homage to actor Stan Laurel before braving Morecambe Bay's treacherous mud flats.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Interview
channel.desc: Irvine Welsh's first novel `Trainspotting' achieved cult status and was turned into a hit film. Its depiction of the lives of heroin addicts in Leith tapped into the zeitgeist of the 1990s. The author has written a sequel, catching up with the exploits of the gang. He speaks to Katie Razzall about class, influence of music in his writing, and why he worries culture is dying.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Mastermind
channel.desc: Clive Myrie hosts the classic quiz where contenders take on the famous black chair. Specialist subjects include the Italian artist Piero della Francesca, Jodie Whittaker's tenure on Doctor Who, Edward III and the short stories of Roald Dahl.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Only Connect
channel.desc: Victoria Coren Mitchell hosts the quiz where knowledge only gets you so far. Fans of Pantomime and Partridge put their passions on hold to puzzle out the connection between clues such as east Azerbaijan, south Holland, Inner Mongolia and New Mexico.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: University Challenge
channel.desc: The University of Bath faces the University of Southampton in another first-round match. Amol Rajan asks the questions.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Human
channel.desc: Shocking new insights into the demise of modern humans' sister species, the Neanderthals, Homo sapiens's possible role in their downfall and how it become the last human species on Earth.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Mandy
channel.desc: Mandy's dreams are shattered by the arrival of a mysterious night-time visitor.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Mandy
channel.desc: An old friend brings a chance of redemption for Mandy, but also misfortune, death, danger and destruction - a heady mix, especially for a Tuesday afternoon.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Newsnight
channel.desc: Featuring extensive coverage of the day's top national and international news stories, along with explanations about the context and potential aftereffects.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: BBC Weather
channel.desc: The latest weather forecast.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: OFF Air
channel.desc: This channel is either off air, or it has no EPG yet. If you think it is broken, please contact us on https://epg.best

channel.title: OFF Air
channel.desc: This channel is either off air, or it has no EPG yet. If you think it is broken, please contact us on https://epg.best

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Ambulance
channel.desc: Rising pressure on the NHS impacts local A&Es, with Croydon and St George's hospitals reaching capacity. As a result, control room dispatchers Ed and Webster have fewer resources to send out to the growing number of patients waiting.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Policing Paradise
channel.desc: Officers prepare for trouble as they seek to evict a squatter from a government building, and the police K9 unit are on the hunt for illegal drugs at the airport.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: How to Win the Ashes
channel.desc: A deep dive into one of the fiercest rivalries in sport. Unearthing stories from the most unforgettable series, a look at what it takes to lift the most famous cricket trophy, the Ashes urn.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: This Is BBC TWO
channel.desc: A preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Animal Park
channel.desc: The keepers race to protect ageing lioness Malaika before the pride turns on her, and Ben attempts to outsmart the macaques before they destroy their new playground. Hamza tries to distinguish the youngest members of the ostrich flock.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Bargain Hunt
channel.desc: Two teams of friends face off to see which of them will win the coveted golden gavel. In red are a pair of university students, and in blue, it is a duo of gym-goers. They journey up country to Wiltshire to sell their lots at Tim Weeks' auction.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Repair Shop: On the Road
channel.desc: A window signed by the poet Robert Burns and a life-changing historic Scottish canoe are both lovingly repaired as the team explore the world of craft beyond the barn.
